definition: a game played on an ice rink by two opposing teams of six skaters each who try to knock a flat round puck into the opponents' goal with angled sticks
details:
noun
- a game played on an ice rink by two opposing teams of six skaters each who try to knock a flat round puck into the opponents' goal with angled sticks
= synonyms: ice hockey
- a game resembling ice hockey that is played on an open field
= synonyms: field hockey
